input.title: Present Perfect
text: This tens show us that an action in the past has a resolt in the present, or an effect in the present. So, there’s that connection between past and present in the present perfect tense

In this examples abow we say ‘i lost my book’ in the past simple tense, that just means i lost my book somewhere in the past, but now i may probably find it.  But when we say ’I have lost my book’ it means what happend in the past is still true now in the present, and my book is still lost.
